SA20bsa058_u:2_0: bhāvābhāvānna janmāsti iti / bījādvīja utpadyamāne ghaṭādapi ghaṭotpattiryujyeta /
SA20bsa058_u:2_3: pratītyasamutpādadharmatā / evaṃ sati śubhāśubhamucchinnabhāraṃ kenacit dṛśyeta /
SA20bsa058_u:3_0: tasya bhāvasyacāsataḥ / janmādānaṃ saṃbhavati iti / evaṃ sati bhāvāsyāsata utpattau vandhyāsutaḥ gaganakusumaṃ śaśaśṛṅgañca saṃbhavet /
SA20bsa058_u:3_3: ucyate tu bhāvasya tasyāsato janmopādānaṃ bhavati [iti] /
SA20bsa058_u:6_0: anyatra uktam / na cakṣuḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ lokastu parimohataḥ /
SA20bsa058_u:9_0: sadasacca mṛtaṃ jātaṃ tannirūddha yadasti na /
SA20bsa058_u:10_2: tacca sāṃvṛt loke / paramārthasya na virodhi / acintyā māyādharmalakṣaṇatā /
SA20bsa058_u:11_1: [na] svayaṃ śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntito na svayaṃbhūhetutaḥ na phalavipākābhinirvṛttitastadvisadṛśānuprabandhata [śceti] /
SA20bsa058_u:11_3: yasmādvījāṅkurau visadṛśau / na caivaṃ yadvījaṃ sa evāṅkura [iti] /
SA20bsa058_u:11_4: evaṃ hi bījaṃ niruddhyate / aṅkura utpadyate / kathaṃ nocchedataḥ / na pūrvaniruddhāddhījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate /
SA20bsa058_u:11_6: tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmavat / kathaṃ na saṅkrāntitaḥ / bījavisadṛśo hyaṅkuraḥ / kathaṃ na svayaṃbhūhetutaḥ / ādyaphalasyāsvayaṃbhāvāt / kathaṃ na phalavipākābhinirvṛttitaḥ /
SA20bsa058_u:11_7: phalasvarūpaṃ siddhyati / na hi phalena phalotpattirasti /
SA20bsa058_u:12_0: skandhotpādarītirapiu / avidyayā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ pañcaskandhāśca siddhyanti /
SA20bsa058_u:13_2: evaṃ sā śūnyatā svayaṃbhūtvā rūpaṃ samīkṣyate /
SA20bsa058_u:14_0: evaṃ bāhya ādhyātmikaḥ sarvo dharmaḥ śūnyaḥ /
SA20bsa058_u:14_1: svabhāvato bhāvo yena hetusaṃbhūtaḥ ataḥ sarvadharma ākāśasamaḥ /
SA20bsa058_u:15_0: na kāraṇaṃ nāpi kāryam ityādinā eṣa lokaḥ paro 'pi ca iti paryantam /
SA20bsa058_u:15_3: evaṃ neṣyate cet kaḥ śubhāśubhaṃ vahati /
SA20bsa058_u:15_4: tīrthikocchedaprasaṅgaḥ / tasyottara [mucyate] / vastutaḥ satyaṃ na bhavati [lokaḥ] /
SA20bsa058_u:17_1: na ca asmi loki mṛti kaści [naro] paraloka saṃkramati gacchati vā /
SA20bsa058_u:17_2: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti [kṛṣṇaśubha] saṃsarato //
SA20bsa058_u:18_2: saṃsāraṃ svapnamāyākhyaṃ na ca karma vinaśyati //
SA20bsa058_u:19_1: pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ tanna kṛtaṃ na kṛtaṃ tacchubhāśubham /
SA20bsa058_u:19_2: sugatasya pūrvākaraṇāt kṛtaṃ tadapi no bhavet //
SA20bsa058_u:19_4: kṛto nirūḍhilābho 'pi kṛtaḥ so 'pi ca no bhavet //
SA20bsa058_u:21_0: yadīśvareṇa kathamapi na nirmitam / kathaṃ hi loka utpannaḥ /
SA20bsa058_u:24_1: tasya ca janma īśvarādinā kenāpi nāvatāritam /
SA20bsa058_u:25_1: na saṃbhavaṃ na vibhavaṃ prajñāyukto vipaśyati //
SA20bsa058_u:26_1: astīti nāstīti ubhe 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā /
SA20bsa058_u:26_2: tasmādubhe anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ //
SA20bsa058_u:27_1: yena tarkaḥ kalpamātraṃ talliṅgaṃ niṣphalaṃ sthitam /
SA20bsa058_u:30_1: bhāvo 'bhāvo na dvitayaṃ sadasanmiśrito na saḥ /
SA20bsa058_u:34_1: śubhāśubhābhyāṃ ṣaṭsu jagadgatiṣu skandhanupādāya loko nāma,
SA20bsa058_u:35_2: ahaṅkāre sati punaḥ karma janma tataḥ punaḥ //
SA20bsa058_u:36_0: rūpaṃ bhautikaṃ / rūpaṃ varṇādyātmakaṃ sadasadubhayānubhayaṃ hetujanitaṃ prajñaptimātram /
SA20bsa058_u:36_2: vedanā sukhaduḥkhātmikā / sā ca pratītyasamutpannā asatkāraṇā budbudopamā /
SA20bsa058_u:36_3: saṃjñā hi na sadvastu / sā hi nāmamātram / marīcikāsadṛśī asatī / saṃskāro 'pi asadvastu, bhojanapānatṛṣṇāsukhajanitaḥ /
SA20bsa058_u:37_3: sa ca nāsti sa īdṛśo bhāva iti /
SA20bsa058_u:37_4: na ca evaṃ sa jñeya iti / na ca sthātā / nāpi sthitiḥ / śavabhūtānaṃ pramāṇakṛtāṃ bālānāṃ vikalpaḥ /
SA20bsa058_u:39_0: skandhanairātmyavijñānairātmyabhāvo vikalpaḥ / siddhaḥ / yato nāsti vandhyāduhitṛbhartṛvat //
SA20bsa058_u:43_1: tatha pṛthivīdhātvādirapi / dharmāṇāṃ mūlaṃ cittamiti cittaṃ niṣiddham /
SA20bsa058_u:44_1: anakṣarasya tattvasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā /
SA20bsa058_u:44_9: pratītyopādāya jātaṃ yat[tat] śūnyaṃ hi pracakṣmahe /
SA20bsa058_u:45_1: tasya mārgamimaṃ niścitya jñānārthaṃ ya advayamārgaḥ sa svayamadvayaḥ /
SA20bsa058_u:45_4: tat jñātvā yaḥ sākṣātkaroti sa tatvajñānāt buddho bhagavān /
SA20bsa058_u:45_7: avidyādito nivṛttamatraṃ cet jñānaṃ tattvajñaḥ [syāt] iti /
SA20bsa058_u:50_0: buddhaguṇanītabhāgīyaṃ dharmakāyaṃ śūnyatāvastu pracakṣate / tena hi prajñāpāramitā //
SA20bsa058_u:52_0: evaṃ prajñāṃ deśayitvā adhunā saṃvṛtāvupāyo deśyate /
SA20bsa058_u:53_1: sūrye uditamatre chāyotpattivadupāya uktaḥ / prathamaṃ dānaṃ mūlamidhīyate / uktamanyatra /
SA20bsa058_u:55_1: tena dānaṃ mūlamuktam / dānāni catvāri / dharmāmiṣābhayamaitrīti / rājyasvaśiraḥparyantamavaradharmadānam /
SA20bsa058_u:55_2: [tathā hi] dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ maṇiḥ muktā pravālaḥ rathaḥ gajaḥ bhṛtyaḥ dāsaḥ dāsīū priyabhāryā duhitṛsutaḥ pradhānasvaṃ,
SA20bsa058_u:55_3: śiraḥ karṇaḥ nāsā pāṇiḥpādaḥ cakṣuḥ svamāṃsaṃ raktaṃ astimajjā medaḥ tvak hṛdayamātmīyaṃ vastu sarvaṃ dadyāt /
SA20bsa058_u:55_4: nanvevaṃ sati bodhisattvacaryā nātiduṣkarā? kuśalopāyo hi buddhalābhakaraḥ /
SA20bsa058_u:56_2: svabhoge alaṃbuddhiḥ, abrahmacaryavarjanam, satyavacanamevaṃ karomīti, apāruṣyavacanam, parārādhanam, dharmaśo vinayacaryābhāṇakasya sagauravabhāṣaṇam,
SA20bsa058_u:57_0: dānaśīlādinā ciramarjite 'pi puṇye yadi kṣāntirnāsti / tadā sadya eva puṇyaṃ naśyet /
SA20bsa058_u:58_2: na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
SA20bsa058_u:59_2: evaṃ- ahaṃ te anuttaradharma samyaksaṃbuddhalābhaṃ karomi bodhisattvacaryaviśuddhiñca karomi /
SA20bsa058_u:59_7: ahamanuttaradharma [samyak] saṃbuddha[lābha]āya bodhisattvacaryāśodhanāya ca trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau agnijvālā bhūtvā brahmabhavana[paryantaṃ] svataḥ paripācayāmi /
SA20bsa058_u:59_9: / parābhibhavamarṣaṇakṣāntiḥ, parīkṣayā [apakāriṣu] apradarśitakopaḥ āyudhena māṃse chinne 'pi adhyadhikāṃ kṣāntiṃ janayitvā ahaṃ śata[dhā] hastacchedakamapi śirasi vahāmi taduparyapi maitracittayuktaḥ /
SA20bsa058_u:59_10: iti // dharmanidhyānakṣāntiḥ atigambhīre yāne atiśobhane munidharme prathamato labdhe kṣaṇamapi kiñcidasandigdhacittatvam /
SA20bsa058_u:60_1: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vinā gatiḥ //
SA20bsa058_u:62_0: vīryakaraṇārthadarśī kenacit priyeṇa viyuktaḥ vipriyeṇa ca saṅgataḥ vyādhijarāmaraṇaśokādiduḥkha durgatau patitaḥ [api] sadā kuśalakṣaṇakuśaladṛṣṭiḥ aṣṭasvakṣanasthāneṣu mokṣakāle ca bodhicaryāṃ saṃpaśyan kausīdyaṃ vihāya dṛḍhīkṛtya vimatihīnaḥ duḥkhaprahāṇāya vīryamārabheta /
SA20bsa058_u:63_1: / prajñā yathā pūrvoktā // dānapāramitādikaṃ dātṛpratigrahītṛyatkiñcidanālambaṃ śūnyatayā prekṣeta /
SA20bsa058_u:63_3: yathā sūryo dvīpān parivartyaṃ nivartate tathā /
SA20bsa058_u:64_0: pāramitāsaṃgrahaḥ / svārthatyāgo dānam / parānugrahaḥ śīlam / gativarjanaṃ kṣamā / kuśalotsāho vīryam / malānupalepo dhyānam / paramārthasatyadeśanāṃ prajñā /
SA20bsa058_u:64_2: buddhasādhakaḥ pitṛmātṛduhitṛbandhu parivārapatnyādirājyabhūmyaiśvaryasaukhyādi [ut] śiṣṭānnavat vihāya mokṣārthaṃ vanaṃ gacchet /
SA20bsa058_u:67_0: prajñā yathā pūrvoktā / katham, pratītyasamutpādena vastuprajñaptilakṣaṇatā /
SA20bsa058_u:67_3: svapne 'pi [na] utpadyate / evaṃ sati upāyaprajñe dve, tadbhedādvaye jāte punardānādibhede bahavo dāṣāḥ syuriti cet /
SA20bsa058_u:68_2: pūrvaṃ parīkṣitavat dharmo nāmamātramucyate / na paramārthato bhāvo 'sti /
SA20bsa058_u:68_6: saṃvṛtau nāma nimittamātram / śabdavida āhuḥ / śabdātsarvamutpannamiti / sa svayameva saṃvṛtau nāmamātraṃ siddhaḥ /
SA20bsa058_u:69_3: cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyatītyādi vyākaraṇaṃ bhagavatā saṃvṛtāvuktam /
SA20bsa058_u:70_1: abhimānena sattvaṃ deśakālamātrāṃ vāśritya bhagavatā varākisadṛśamuktam /
SA20bsa058_u:70_3: duḥkhasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayasatyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ mārgasatyamityādyāryasatyāni catvāri saṃvṛtau deśitāni /
SA20bsa058_u:71_1: nāyako bhagavato vacanam / rūpaśabdādisamāgamakāmānāṃ sattvānāṃ prakāśayati /
SA20bsa058_u:71_2: yena yān vividhairūpāyaiḥ sattvān vineyān vinayati,
SA20bsa058_u:73_1: taimirika iva cakṣuḥ svayaṃ cakṣū rūpañca na paśyati /
SA20bsa058_u:73_2: sa cittadharmaśca,- cittena citte dṛṣṭamātre cittaṃ na dṛśyate /
SA20bsa058_u:76_1: tadaviparītaṃ tattvam / lokaḥ prākṛtaḥ yadajānānaḥ yat- cintāpadmabhūtaṃ manasā acintyamindriyāviṣayabhūtamajñānapaṭalāndhakārapratiruddhamadṛṣṭaṃ- tyajati /
